rivals_jessica_johnson_activation: What the... Listen, kid, I was hoping this wouldn't happen. I really like Fred, but that's not gonna hold me back from defending my own freaking neighborhood. Get out of Hell's Kitchen. It's mine.
rivals_jessica_johnson_deactivation: All right. I see what you did, kid. Respect for backing off. Now stay chill in Hell's Kitchen. All right. There are plenty of other neighborhoods.
rivals_jessica_johnson_entrance: Hey, kid. That's what Fred always calls you, right, kid? That's cute. Anyway, have fun with your little business, but don't give me any reason to worry about you, all right? Keep it small, kid.
rivals_jessica_johnson_hirebestemployees: We did some research yesterday. Actually. We were looking online to see who works for you. We found some really skilled people. Might be time for them to get a raise and maybe a new employer.
rivals_jessica_johnson_lowdemand: I just had a great idea I wanted to share with you. What if I expanded all of my businesses' inventory with exactly what you're selling? Imagine what will happen with the demand. Imagine how hard it would be for you to keep up your revenue. That's a real good idea, I think.
rivals_jessica_johnson_pricereduction: I had my mole visit your silly little business. Prices must be turning a nice profit, right? Imagine where your customers will go when they hear about my prices. Bye sugar.
rivals_jessica_johnson_productshortage: Guess who went shopping last night? Me. Guess what I purchased? Yes, all of your favorite products. You know what a product shortage means, right? Well, I'm sure your customers will the next time you go to the wholesaler.
rivals_jessica_johnson_rentrivalbuilding: Come on, kid, you're not that slow. Trying to rent one of my buildings to expand your little empire and compete with me, seriously? Come on.
rivals_jessica_johnson_surrender: All right, you win. Jeez, you just have no respect, huh? I've been controlling Hell's Kitchen for ten years. Then you just come waltzing in, acting like the boss. No kidding Fred is your uncle. Goodbye... for now.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_activation: This is really unacceptable. Another business? You suddenly forgot who owns this neighborhood. I'm not looking for more rivals. I would rather destroy them. So you should consider if it's better business to shut down your own business.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_deactivation: Ahhh, sehr gut! You know, sometimes you don’t know what you’re up against, until it bites you. I respect you changed your mind. Let’s keep it that way.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_entrance: Hello! I see you opened a business in our neighborhood, Garment District. Listen junge, you’re more than welcome here, but remember who owns this neighborhood. So don’t get any big ideas. Tschüss!
rivals_ingrid_schneider_hirebestemployee: I assume you’re very happy with your most skilled staff right? Well, mal schauen. I've got my eye on them. So I bet they are going to be really interested in hearing the salary I’m offering, compared to your little establishment.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_lowdemand: Oh yeah, you probably feel really clever, opening your little businesses based on demands, right? You think I don’t have the capital to flood the market with the products you sell? You should keep an eye on demand, mein liebling, because you might not even be able to see it when I'm done with you.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_pricereduction: Really? Someone thinks they can compete with my prices? Da hast du dich aber geschnitten, mein Schatz. I'll slash my prices and knock your profit margins down. Customers are going to flock to me. Mach dich bereit, because things are about to get real tough, Liebes.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_productshortage: Hey! Nicht so schnell, Schätzchen. I've got a little surprise for you. Have you visited your favorite wholesaler recently? If not, you’ll see a sudden shortage of all your favorite products. Good luck making a profit, mein Liebling.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_rentrivalbuildin: Haha, that's ridiculous. You trying to rent one of my buildings to expand on your laughable little enterprise? Forget about it! Sei nicht albern mein liebling!
rivals_ingrid_schneider_surrender: Ah, you're so annoying. You're really never going to give up, are you? Well, I'm calling to say that Garment District is yours, so congratulations, I guess. You know what? I don't even care. My business in New York has always just been secondary for me. My empire remains in Berlin, and I hope I will never have to see you again. Auf wiedersehen, für immer.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_activation: Hmmmmm! I thought I told you very clearly: don't get too ambitious in Murray Hill, compris? I thought we could stay good friends. But not if you're planning to take over my neighborhood. Until you shut down one of your businesses, expect to feel my anger!
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_deactivati: Mon ami, I am glad to see you changed your mind. And we can stay friends. Now you are not bothering me. I'll stop bothering you. Mm. Pas fait pour tout le monde. Bonne journée.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_entrance: Bonjour, mon ami, and welcome to Murray Hill. We at TLM Enterprise always welcome new businesses. Just remember, don't get too ambitious and we will stay good friends. Au revoir, a bientôt.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_hirebestem: Ooh la la. Your star employee. Mine now, huh? They will see the light and jump ship. Enjoy your low skilled replacements while I seduce your top staff.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_lowdemand: Écoute. Do you know why you are able to sell your products at such a high price? Du monde. Mon ami, see, du monde. You know what happens if I keep opening similar businesses? Selling the same products? Mm. Exactement. Bon voyage de monde. Bon voyage.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_pricereduc: Let's see how strong your bank account really is. Good luck competing with the rock bottom prices I am offering now. Say au revoir to profits, my friend.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_productsho: Hahahahaha! Incapable of keeping up with the demand, aren't you? Huh? It's no coincidence, as most of those products you like to sell are now in my warehouse. Have fun paying over-price at the wholesalers.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_rentrivalb: No no, no. No more renting my properties for you, my friend. Consider it a favor. Mm. And now scram, and find some rundown hole to hide in. C'est moi qui contrôle les prime spots. Mon ami.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_surrender: Ah, I see the numbers. I am not stupid. Bravo! Bravo! On pushing me out on my own neighborhood. I never liked the city anyway. I always dreamt of going back to Paris. You finally gave me a reason to. And if I ever see you open as much as a food truck en France... Don't even think about it. Au revoir.
rivals_huang_guo_activation: Hey! An act of war. That's what it is when you keep opening up businesses in Midtown. Are you ready to feel the rage of Huang? You should be, because it is on like a donkey in the Kong. Okay. Good, good.
rivals_huang_guo_deactivation: Maybe you're not as stupid as I initially thought. Good choice. Backing off. Okay, good, good. Get out. Good.
rivals_huang_guo_entrance: Ah, welcome, my friend. Welcome to Midtown. This is the most prestigious neighborhood in the city of Manhattan. And we at Guo Investments, we strongly recommend that we avoid any conflicts of interest. Do you understand? That means understanding who runs things in town. Okay. Good, good.
rivals_huang_guo_hirebestemployees: Ah, my colleague. I have some exciting plans for today. I'm planning to message all of your most skilled employees. I'll message them saying: Hello. Do you want same job, but much better pay? Yes? Good.
rivals_huang_guo_lowdemand: Hello my friend. This is a Huang talking. He's the guy who's now selling all the products you sell too. And I don't care about the huge drop in demand. But I'm sure you do. Okay. Toodle, toodle. Bye. Good.
rivals_huang_guo_pricereduction: Oh, hello, my friend. Just a quick heads up. Okay. We have a big discount in all of my stores, and we sell everything you sell. But like with the baby birds: Cheap, cheap. Cheaper. Good.
rivals_huang_guo_productshortage: Yeah. You know what's really bad for business? Low profit margins. That's why my staff is currently driving around the city of Manhattan buying all the products you like to sell. So you can look forward to much higher wholesale prices. Okay, good. Shake your head down and up. Good.
rivals_huang_guo_rentrivalbuilding: Or you want to rent one of my buildings in my neighborhood. Huh? How about, uh, I loan you my car? Or you could borrow my wife. Huh? Or maybe you want to borrow my shoes. Oh, wait. You wouldn't survive a day in them. Especially my wife. Forget about it.
rivals_huang_guo_surrender: I still don't understand how this happened. Do you know someone at City Hall? Government? I bet you do. Oh, cheat! I'm going back to Beijing and don't ever think about visiting, okay? Not good. Very not good.
rivals_poach_employee_offer: Hey boss. This isn't easy to say, but I got a really good offer to work for {rivalName}, and I am strongly considering it. However, if you're able to match an hourly wage of {amount}, I will gladly stay here with you. I've got {days} days to make my decision.
rivals_poach_employee_accept: Most excellent! I look forward to continuing my time working for you!
rivals_poach_employee_decline: That's disappointing to hear, but with that decision I will be moving on! Thank you, goodbye!
rivals_poach_employee_expired: Well, I haven't heard back from you, so I am going to take that as a sign from the universe that it's time to continue my journey somewhere else.
rivals_poach_employee_rival_surrender: I've heard that {rivalName} is out of business, so I've decided to keep working for you. I wouldn't mind that raise, though.
rivals_poach_employee_raise_accepted: Wow, I didn't expect you to actually give me that raise! I'm really happy to continue working for you. Thanks!
rivals_poach_employee_raise_declined: It was worth a shot, but I'm glad I can continue working for you. See you at work!
notification_cannot_rent_building_owned_: The building owner, your Rival {name}, has declined your offer to rent their building

bizman_presentation_electrical_appliance: Electrical Appliances - the cost of the electrical appliances included in the building

rivals_jessica_johnson_hirebestemployees: Did you train up some new employees for me? Thanks, kid. It feels like it's time to send a few more business offers.
rivals_jessica_johnson_lowdemand2: You just have such great taste in stores, sugar, I had to copy you again! I hope that doesn't cause you too much pain.
rivals_jessica_johnson_pricereduction2: I hear you're charging your customers way too much again. At least compared to my new prices. Good luck.
rivals_jessica_johnson_productshortage2: Oops, I did it again. I accidentally bought out some of your favorite products. I'm sure you can deal with another product shortage!
rivals_ingrid_schneider_hirebestemployee: I think it's time you talked with a few of your staff again. Seems like they're interested in finally abandoning your little attempt at a store!
rivals_ingrid_schneider_lowdemand2: Hey there, Liebes, are you getting too comfortable? Allow me to fix that. I figured out what to sell at my new store - your best sellers, of course!
rivals_ingrid_schneider_pricereduction2: Are you enjoying your profit margins, Schätzchen? Well, I'm dropping prices again, so you'll probably lose your customers again. So sad.
rivals_ingrid_schneider_productshortage2: I have great news! I just went on another shopping spree. Be sure to visit the wholesaler to enjoy the shortage I created!
employee_contact_complaint_low_satisfact: For a while now, my requests have been ignored here. Honestly, I was planning on leaving soon, but {rivalName} made me an offer that includes my demands, so I am leaving {businessName} immediately.
employee_contact_complaint_low_skill: {rivalName} has offered me free job training if I go work for them. If you're willing to send me to training in the next 24 hours, nothing else has to change. Otherwise, I will be leaving {businessName}.
employee_contact_complaint_low_no_task: You don't seem to currently have any work or training for me to do, and {rivalName} has offered me a job. If I haven't been given a task within 24 hours, I will accept their offer.
employee_contact_complaint_unfulfilled_d: My request for {jobDemandName} has not been met. {rivalName} has promised to provide it if I go work for them. I will wait 72 hours to see if anything changes, otherwise I will be leaving {businessName}.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_hirebestem: Tiens, bonjour, petit. While you are busy looking at this message, I've been busy stealing your best employees again.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_lowdemand2: Impressive store you have in my district. I can tell you're feeling competitive, mon ami, so I opened the same store as you!
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_pricereduc: Haha! Are your customers complaining about your prices again? That might be my fault - your prices now seem too high compared to mine.
rivals_thierry_laurent_moreau_productsho: I hope your warehouses are full! Otherwise you might run out of some of your customer's favorite products since I just bought up all the inventory!

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)

help_employee_skill_content:
Your employee's *skill level* impacts their job performance and customer service.

**Training**

Employee skill can be increased through training.

* **Manual training** - train the employee from the [MyEmployees](skill-myemployees) app on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone). This increases skill the fastest, but requires the employee be unassigned from their position during training. Training ends at 17:00 (5pm) the day after they have been sent to training.
* **Automatic HR Manager Training** - if your employee is assigned to an [HR Manager](skill-hrmanager), they will automatically increase their skill slowly each day. The employee continues to work during this training.
* **On-the-job Training** - while your employee works, they will very slowly gain skill overtime through natural on-the-job training. This is the slowest way to increase skill.

**Wages**

As your employees increase in skill, their wages will also increase.
help_rivals_overview_content:
**The Rivalry Begins**

You may be new to the city, but it's already filled with 20 savvy business rivals who won't take too kindly to you stepping onto their turf!

You will face two types of rivals:
* [Special Rivals](special-rivals)
* [Minor Rivals](minor-rivals)

As you build up your businesses, expect the rivals to launch several different types of attacks to try to slow you down and hinder your progress. Show them that you're here to stay and declare your dominance over New York City!

**Rivals App**

Track and monitor your rivals' actions in the Rivals app on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)
help_special_rivals_content:
Each neighborhood has their own *Special Rival*:
* **Ingrid Schneider** in Garment District
* **Jessica Johnson** in Hell's Kitchen
* **Thierry Laurent Moreau** in Murray Hill
* **Huang Guo** in Midtown.

These rivals will attempt to sabotage your businesses as you grow. An active rival won't even let you rent from their buildings!

**Special Rival Attacks**
* Lowered Prices - the rival will lower their prices on some items you also sell, forcing you to lower your prices or lose customers.

* Lowered Demand - the rival will start new businesses that you are also running, in order to lower the demand of the products you are selling.

* Poaching Employees - the rival can offer your best employees an even better salary. You will have the opportunity to match that salary if you want to keep them.
help_minor_rivals_content:
The minor rivals are different in each playthrough, and they are scattered throughout the 5 districts.

**Minor Rival Attacks**

These rivals won't target you as directly and intensely as the special rivals, but they can still cause pain as they can offer your employees better job conditions.

To avoid losing your employees to these rivals:
* Fulfill the employees' demands
* Train their primary skill
* Keep them assigned to a task.

And, of course, it never hurts to give your employees a bonus from the [MyEmployees](skill-myemployees) app on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)!
help_itemname_securitysign_content:
**Security Sign** slightly reduces theft in your stores. It doesn't add to your [Security](building-security) number, but hanging one sign in your store does help lower theft amounts.

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)

help_importers_contract_content:
**Import Contract**
* Hire a [Purchasing Agent](skill-purchasingagent)
* Create a [Computer Workstation](furniture-computerworkstation) for them in your [Headquarters](businesstypes-headquarters)
* Assign the Agent to the workstation and the headquarters schedule
* Rent and start a [warehouse](businesstypes-warehouse) or [factory](businesstypes-factory)
* Visit an import location and set up a contract between them and your Purchasing Agent

Each Purchasing Agent can [import inventory](importers-overview) from one import location at a time.

**Retail Inventory Importers**
* [Jet Cargo Imports](importers-jetcargo)
* [Seaside Internationals](importers-seaside)
* [United Ocean Imports](importers-unitedocean)
* [Bluestone Imports](importers-bluestone)

**Factory Raw Goods Importers**
* [Lunar Tide Shipments](importers-lunartide)
* [Maritime Freight Line](importers-maritimefreight)
* [Aquatic Bay Cargo](importers-aquaticbay)
help_logistics_overview_content:
**How to Delivery Inventory from Warehouses to Stores**

After setting up your [Delivery Plans](logistics-contract), it's time to deliver to your stores!

**Ensure Successful Deliveries**
* Delivery Plans are shipped once per day at 08:00 (8 AM)
* Each retail delivery location needs [Storage Shelves](furniture-storageshelf) to receive the inventory
* Each warehouse / factory delivery location needs [Pallet Shelves](furniture-palletshelf) to receive the inventory

**Smart Deliveries**

The Logistics Manager will adjust the delivery amount based on current store stock (this includes all the inventory in the store - on storage shelves and on display shelves)

*Example:*
Your target amount is 5,000 Paperbags.
Your store already has a Cash Register holding 1,000 Paperbags
Your store also has a Storage Shelf holding 2,000 Paperbags.
Your Logistics Manager will ship 2,000 more Paperbags so your store total is 5,000.

**Warehouse to Warehouse Shipping**

You can also ship from one warehouse to another warehouse to create a more complex logistics network.

Simply set the other warehouse as one of the Logistics Manager's destinations in their Delivery Plan.

help_counterattack_rivals_content:
It's time to fight back against the rivals! 

**Counterattacks**
* Lowered Prices - if you lower your selling price on items rivals also sell, all the rivals in that neighborhood will be forced to lower their prices as well, and lose some of their weekly income. And if you keep this up for a few weeks, you'll also see their stores' valuation going down!

* Lowered Demand - you can open up new businesses that your rivals are also running in order to lower the demand of the products they are selling, which will also lower their weekly income.

* Poaching Employees - you can find each rivals' employees listed in their company's BizMan page. Here you can attempt to poach a rival's employees by negotiating a better wage for them. If you successfully poach them, the rival will be forced to replace them with an inferior employee, lowering their store's weekly income.

dialog_candidate_salary_accepted_player_: I think that's a fair salary, I'm going to accept, thank you! I'm really looking forward to get started.
help_building_customersovertime_content:
The **Customers Over Time** graph tracks how many customers have come into your store over a certain period of time.

Compare this information with the building's [Customer Capacity](building-limit), and it can be used to help determine the best time to be open, whether you should close on certain days of the week, or whether you need more marketing!

This graph has two modes, click the buttons at the top-right corner of the graph to switch between them:
* **Yesterday** - gives you an hour-by-hour breakdown of yesterday's customers
* **7 Days** - gives you a day-by-day overview of the last 7 days' customers

**Note:** Keep in mind, just because customers come to the store doesn't mean they are buying things. Your prices might be too high, or you might not have what they are looking for available.

business_description_moving_company: Moving made easy, every time. Relocate with confidence.
dialog_moving_service_start: Hi and welcome to Manhattan Movers. How may I help you today?
dialog_moving_service_cant_move_in_non_r: Hello, we had a move planned for the building on {businessName}, but it seems that the building is no longer registered in your name. We've cancelled the move.
dialog_moving_service_cant_move_while_in: We couldn't perform the move on {businessName} due to unexpected activity inside. We'll try again tomorrow.
dialog_moving_service_not_enough_money: Hello, it seems that we were unable to charge you the cost of the move from {businessName} to {businessName2}. We've cancelled the order. Please, ensure you have sufficient funds for our services.
dialog_moving_service_contract_set_playe: I'd like to have the address {businessName} to be moved to {businessName2} on day {day}
dialog_moving_service_contract_set_manag: Thank you very much. We'll start the move on day {day}. Please notice that the addresses won't be accessible until the move has finished.
dialog_moving_service_accept_sell_items_: Do you accept that we'll sell all existing items found in the destination address and subtract it from your total price?
dialog_moving_service_done:
We’re happy to let you know that we have just moved the last interior from {businessName} to {businessName2}. Both buildings are now accessible again.

Thank you for using {businessName3}!

help_building_movingservice_content:
**Manhattan Movers** can move any residential, retail, office, warehouse or factory to another similar size or larger location!

After agreeing to their services for a base fee, plus a fee-per-item being moved, the move will be set up for the day you select.

On that day, both businesses will be inaccessible until the move is complete. Any items in the destination building will be sold and the price will be deducted from the total, or refunded to you if the total exceeds the amount you owe.

 Visit the agent at [Manhattan Movers](address: 15 12s) office to set up your move.
help_businesstype_factory_content:
**Factories** are used to manufacture goods created from raw ingredients. They are placed in warehouse buildings.

Factories require the following furniture to function:

* [Input Station](furniture-inputstation)
* [Output Station](furniture-outputstation)
* At least one other Factory Machine.

Factories can manufacture many of the items you can sell in your stores. Raw goods can be imported to your Factory  with your [Purchasing Agent](skill-purchasingagent).

Distribution of manufactured goods can be managed by your [Logistics Manager](skill-logisticsmanager).

The business requires at least one vehicle to make deliveries. It can use any vehicle, although larger vehicles are more effective.

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Factory Worker](skill-factoryworker)
* [Delivery Driver](skill-deliverydriver)
help_skillname_factoryworker_content:
Employees with **Factory Worker** skill are used for [Factories](businesstypes-factory).

Factory Workers each are assigned to a Factory Machine in the Factory and will operate that machine.

They can be assigned to:
* [Input Station](furniture-inputstation)
* [Output Station](furniture-outputstation)

They can be hired from:
* [Anderson Recruitment Corp.](address: 16 5a)

help_itemname_conveyorbelt_content:
**Conveyor Belts** are used to connect Factory Machines together.

 Multiple conveyor belts can connect together to create longer and more complex pathways.

**Special Conveyor Belt Pieces**

Corners:
* Connect a new conveyor belt to an existing conveyor belt and rotate the new conveyor belt so it is flowing the direction you want the corner to turn. The new conveyor belt piece will automatically become a corner piece.

Merges:
* If one pathway collides with another pathway, they will merge. The connecting conveyor belt piece will automatically become a merge piece.

Splitters:
* To split one line into two, you'll need a [Conveyor Belt Splitter](furniture-conveyorbeltsplitter).

The machine can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Factory Supply Depot](address:2 25s)

help_itemname_inputstation_content:
**Input Station** is a Factory Machine that requires employees with [Factory Worker](skill-factoryworker) skill.

The machine is required to begin any production pathway. Use [Conveyor Belts](furniture-conveyorbelt) to connect the Input Station to any other Factory Machine.

Choose which raw or manufactured ingredient the Input Station should use, and the Factory Worker will keep the machine stocked with inventory from storage in your Factory.

The machine can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Factory Supply Depot](address:2 25s)
help_itemname_outputstation_content:
**Output Station** is a Factory Machine that requires employees with [Factory Worker](skill-factoryworker) skill.

The machine is required to complete any production pathway. Use [Conveyor Belts](furniture-conveyorbelt) to connect the Output Station to any other Factory Machine.

The Output Station packages up the inventory it receives in boxes, and the Factory Worker will move full boxes of inventory from the machine to storage in your Factory.

The machine can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Factory Supply Depot](address:2 25s)
help_itemname_conveyorbeltsplitter_conte:
**Conveyor Belt Splitters** are used to split [Conveyor Belt](furniture-conveyorbelt) pathways in two. Connect the conveyor belt splitter to the end of an existing conveyor belt pathway to divide that pathway in two.

When inventory flows to the splitter, it will alternate between the two new pathways.

The machine can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Factory Supply Depot](address:2 25s)

The product can be used by the following Factory Machines:

* [Consumer Goods Assembly Machine](furniture-consumergoodsassemblymachine)
* [Input Station](furniture-inputstation)

The product can be used to manufacture the following products:

* [Gift (Expensive)](products-expensivegift)

The product can be manufactured from the following ingredients:
* [Glass](products-glass)

The product can be manufactured using the following machines:
* [Laser Cutting Machine](furniture-lasercuttingmachine)
help_itemname_kilnmachine_content:
**Kiln Machine** is a Factory Machine.

The machine receives items from an [Input Station](furniture-inputstation) or another Factory Machine to manufacture the following items:

* [Ceramic Mug](products-ceramicmug)
* [Molded Earbuds](products-moldedearbuds)
* [Molded Headphones](products-moldedheadphones)
* [Molded Smartphone](products-moldedsmartphone)
* [Molded Smartwatch](products-moldedsmartwatch)
* [Molded Snow Globe Base](products-moldedsnowglobebase)
* [Molded Snow Globe Figure](products-moldedsnowglobefigure)

The machine can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Factory Supply Depot](address:2 25s)

help_itemname_nightclubcovercharge_conte:
**Nightclub Cover Charge** is a fee collected from customers when they enter [Nightclubs](businesstypes-nightclub).

The fee comes in two varieties: 
* Weekday Cover Charge
* Weekend Cover Charge

Nothing is required to collect this fee, it happens automatically when customers enter the business.
help_itemname_productdisplaystandtiered_:
**Display Stand (Tiered Product)** can be used to sell:

* [Flower (Cheap)](products-cheapflower)
* [Flower (Expensive)](products-expensiveflower)

**Product Capacity:**
* Flower (Cheap): 40
* Flower (Expensive): 25
**Customer Capacity:** 15

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
help_itemname_itemgroupworkoutmachine_co:
Different workouts can be done with each type of workout machine
* Boxing using [Boxing Bag](furniture-boxingbag)
* Sit-ups using [Fitball](furniture-fitball)
* Jump using [Fitness Trampoline](furniture-fitnesstrampoline)
* Sit-ups using [Gym Mat](furniture-gymmat)
* Kettlebell Pull using [Kettlebells](furniture-kettlebells)
* Deadlift using [Loaded Barbell](furniture-loadedbarbell)
* Pull-ups using [Pull-Up Bar](furniture-pullupbar)
* Squats using [Squats Station](furniture-squatsstation)
* Run using [Treadmill](furniture-treadmill)
* Bench Press using [Workout Bench](furniture-workoutbench)
help_businesstype_gym_content:
**Gyms** are retail businesses. 

Customers are served by employees.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Fitness Planning Board](furniture-fitnessplanningboard)
* [Public Shower](furniture-publicshower)
* [Gym Lockers](furniture-gymlockers)
* At least one [Workout Machines](furniture-itemgroupworkoutmachine)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Gym Cover Charge](fees-gymcovercharge)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Gym Trainer](skill-gymtrainer)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_skillname_gymtrainer_content:
Employees with the **Gym Trainer** skill are used for gyms.

Gym Trainers keep the customers with their workouts.

They can be assigned to:
* [Fitness Planning Board](furniture-fitnessplanningboard)

They can be hired from:
* [Anderson Recruitment Corp.](address: 16 5a)
help_itemname_fitnessplanningboard_conte:
A **Fitness Planning Board** is a special *employee station* that requires employees with [Gym Trainer](skill-gymtrainer) skill.

**Customer Capacity:** 20

It is required to run a [Gym](businesstypes-gym).

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
help_itemname_gymcovercharge_content:
**Gym Cover Charge** is a fee collected from customers when they enter [Gyms](businesstypes-gym).

Nothing is required to collect this fee, it happens automatically when customers enter the business.
help_itemname_gymlockers_content:
**Gym Lockers** are required in all [Gyms](businesstypes-gym) and can be used to change your clothes.

**Customer Capacity:** 10

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
help_itemname_publicshower_content:
**Public Showers** are required in all [Gyms](businesstypes-gym).

**Customer Capacity:** 10

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
help_itemname_loadedbarbell_content:
**Loaded Barbell** can be used in a [Gym](businesstypes-gym) to [exercise](common_exercise).

**Customer Capacity:** 2
(customer capacity from all workout equipment is combined)

*Note:* To use this furniture at the gym, you must change into workout clothes from a [Gym Locker](furniture-gymlockers), [Wardrobe](furniture-wardrobe) or [Wardrobe Wall](furniture-wardrobewall).

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)

help_common_accessories_content:
**Character Accessories**

Your character can hold items such as umbrellas or headphones in your inventory.

To add an item to your inventory, click the Equip button while holding that item.

To interact with your inventory items
* Click the button near the lower corner of your character profile image to toggle your inventory
* Click the Eye icon to toggle the visibility of each item
* Click the item to unequip the item.

Accessories:
* [Umbrella](products-umbrella)
* [Noize Boss Earbuds](products-earbuds01)
* [Rhythm By Tre](products-headphones01)
help_itemname_umbrella_content:
**Umbrella** is a type of product primarily sold from [Gift Shops](businesstypes-giftshop).

Additionally, it can be sold from:

* [Florists](businesstypes-florist)
* [Bookstore](businesstypes-bookstore)

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Product Panel](furniture-productpanel)

The product can be used as a [Character Accessory](common_accessories) to block negative effects of rain.
The accessory can be stored in an [Umbrella Stand](furniture-umbrellastand).

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)
help_itemname_umbrellastand_content:
**Umbrella Stand** can store [Umbrella](products-umbrella) for personal use. 

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations: 
* [Ika Bohag](address:50 4s)
help_itemname_wardrobewall_content:
**Wardrobe Wall** can store clothing and can be used to change your clothes. 

*Note:* You are required to change into workout clothes before you can [exercise](common_exercise).

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations: 
* [Ika Bohag](address:50 4s)

help_itemname_uniformlocker_content:
**Uniform Locker** is used to setup employee uniforms for your business.

With an Uniform Locker in your business, you can set up uniforms for your employees in each business in the Settings page of your BizMan app on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations: 
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)

employee_contact_message_low_satisfactio:
Hi boss!

I have to let you know that recently I haven't been happy with my job because my request for {jobDemandName} has not been met.

To be honest, if the situation doesn't change soon, I'll see myself forced to find another job at a different company.

I hope you understand and will apply the necessary changes.

Best wishes,
{employeeName} ({businessName})
dialog_installation_firm_on_cancel_contr: Alright, we'll cancel that contract right away.
help_itemname_jobboard_content:
**Job Board** can be used to recruit walk-in employees by placing the board on the wall of the retail business you wish to find recruits.

You can manage your recruits on the [MyEmployees App](skill-myemployees) on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)

The Job Board is slower than using either of the recruiters or the [Headhunter](skill-headhunter) Employee, but it is free to use after you purchase it!

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
* [Mr. Scott's Office Supplies](address:39 4a)

dialog_doctor_plastic_surgery_prompt: Sure, we can change your appearance for a fee. Just let me know what you want to change. The surgery takes about {hours} hours.
help_itemname_bathrooms_content:
**Bathrooms** are required in office businesses and are needed in retail stores to satisfy certain [Customer Demands](building-customerdemands).

To satisfy bathroom demands, you need toilets and sinks.

**Toilet Options**
* [Bathroom Stall](furniture-toiletstall)
* [Toilet](furniture-toilet)

**Sink Options**
* [Modular Sink](furniture-sinkmodular)
* [Sink](furniture-sink)

help_logistics_contract_content:
**Delivery Plan**
* Hire a [Logistics Manager](skill-logisticsmanager)
* Create a [Computer Workstation](furniture-computerworkstation) for them in your [Headquarters](businesstypes-headquarters)
* Assign the Manager to the workstation and the headquarters schedule
* Create and manage their delivery plan in the BizMan app on your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)

Each Logistics Manager can manage one [Delivery Plan](logistics-overview) at a time.

**Number of Delivery Locations Is Based On**
* Skill of the Logistics Manager
* How many vehicles/slots are in the warehouse or factory
* Type of the delivery vehicles

**Warehouse Delivery Vehicles**
* Up to 4 delivery Locations: [Mersaidi Dash](vehicletypename_mersaididash)
* Up to 4 delivery Locations: [UMC Nunavut](vehicletypename_umcnunavut)
* Up to 4 delivery Locations: [Vord V150](vehicletypename_vordv150)
* Up to 6 delivery Locations: [Vord Courier D500](vehicletypename_deliverytruck)
* Up to 8 delivery Locations: [Freight Truck T1](vehicletypename_freighttruckt1)

Purchase a vehicle, drive it into your [warehouse](businesstypes-warehouse) or [factory](businesstypes-factory) and assign it to a [Delivery Driver](skill-deliverydriver).
help_vehicletypename_refuelrepair_conten:
**Gas Station and Vehicle Repair Shops** are used to fix any issues with your vehicles and bring them back to their original condition.

**Fuel**

As you drive around, your vehicle will use fuel - you can see your current fuel levels in the vehicle panel while driving. Visit a gas station to refuel your vehicle.

**Vechicle Condition**

Each time you crash into something, your vehicle will take damage - you can see your current vehicle condition in the vehicle panel while driving. Visit the garage next to the gas station to repair your vehicle.

**Car Wash**

While driving around, your vehicle will start to get dirty. Visit the garage next to the gas station to clean your vehicle.

**Calling the Tow Truck**

If your vehicle runs out of fuel or your vehicle condition hits 0%, you can't drive the vehicle. In that case, call the Tow Truck from the Contacts app of your [BizPhone](general-bizphone)

Gas Stations can be found at the following locations:
* [Freedom Fuel](address: 14 11s)
* [Manhattan Gas](address: 47 5a)
* [Refuel and Recharge](address: 10 24s)
* [United Gasoline](address: 7 1a)

And a larger station for Freight Trucks can be found at the following locations:
* [IC Truckers](address: 3 7a)

dialog_uncle_fred_first_checkpoint_start: Are you ready to hire your first employee?
dialog_uncle_fred_second_checkpoint_star: Are you ready to start another business?
dialog_uncle_fred_third_checkpoint_start: Are you ready to open a headquarters?
dialog_uncle_fred_third_checkpoint_end_d: Wonderful! Let's build your business hub!
dialog_uncle_fred_fourth_checkpoint_star: Are you ready to expand your headquarters?
dialog_uncle_fred_fourth_checkpoint_end_: Wonderful! Let's get even more things automated!
dialog_uncle_fred_fifth_checkpoint_start: Are you ready to build a factory?
tutorial_quest_rent_your_apartment_uncle: Hey kid, it's your Uncle Fred, I just got your message! Congratulations on taking your first big step toward becoming a massive success like me! But remember, you have to earn it, so let’s get started! Now that park bench might look like a comfortable place to sleep, but I have a better option for you - a friend of mine owns a building with an empty apartment. Go claim it!
tutorial_quest_get_some_food_uncle_fred: Very nice, you found the apartment! But it’s looking really empty in here. Let’s get you a few essentials to fill up the place. We’ll start with some food. You can't conquer the world on an empty stomach.
tutorial_quest_get_some_food_objective_3: Place the Standard Fridge in your apartment
tutorial_quest_get_some_food_objective_4: Put Fresh Food in your Fridge
tutorial_quest_get_some_sleep_uncle_fred: Okay Now let’s find you a bed. Oh, and someone told me you were walking around the city. That just won’t do, so I got you hooked up with a free car. It’s waiting for you over by the car dealership. Now this thing's not gonna win any beauty contests, but remember: IT WAS FREE!! Check it out!
tutorial_quest_get_some_sleep_objective_: Place the Bed in your apartment
tutorial_quest_find_a_job_uncle_fred: Rise and shine, kiddo! You survived your first night in New York City, congratulations! I’m sure it helped that I paid yesterday’s rent too. But from here on out, no more handouts! Today you need to find a job and start to earn your own money!
tutorial_quest_establish_first_business_: There you go, you’ve earned a little money. But you know who earned more? The store owner! Are you ready to open your own store and keep all the profits yourself? Head to the bank to get a loan. I’ve already talked to my buddy, Larry. He’ll get you squared away
Get a $15,000 loan from Jensen Capital
Rent an A1 or A2 retail building
tutorial_quest_moving_in_uncle_fred: Okay, good choice for your first store. Gotta start somewhere, right? Now let’s get your store set up for business! Listen and learn, kiddo.
tutorial_quest_moving_in_objective_2:
Purchase furniture required to open your store. Recommended items:
{list}
tutorial_quest_stocking_up_uncle_fred: Look at that! It’s starting to look like a real store in here! But something's missing. Oh yeah - you need something to sell. Let’s head over to the wholesaler and pick up some inventory.
tutorial_quest_stocking_up_objective_1:
Purchase inventory to sell at your store. Recommended items:
{list}
tutorial_quest_open_the_store_uncle_fred: Now this is impressive! You’ve got all the basics set up for your first store! Well done, you’re making the family proud, kid! Especially me. Now open the business and start collecting that cash! I’m rootin’ for ya, kiddo!
tutorial_quest_cleaning_uncle_fred: Congratulations, you’re finally earning your own money! It feels good, doesn't it? You built a store, and the customers showed up! And then they all started trashing the place. Let’s clean it up before your next shift!
tutorial_quest_cleaning_objective_2: Place the cleaning station in your store
tutorial_checkpoint_first_uncle_fred: Well pop the champagne, because you’ve got your first business up and running. Look, I’m headed to a golf tournament now, but if you keep things stocked and cleaned, you’ll be fine! I believe in you. Call me when you think you can afford to start hiring employees!
tutorial_checkpoint_first_objective: Call Uncle Fred when you’re ready to hire employees
tutorial_quest_recruiting_uncle_fred: Hey, business kid! You know, it can be tough to balance it all: cleaning, restocking, running the cash register. Here's what you should do: you should hire some employees and put them to work for you! You’ll need to take some business classes first, though, so you know what you’re doing!
tutorial_quest_recruiting_objective_1: Complete the 'Basic HR' course at the Manhattan Business School
tutorial_quest_recruiting_objective_2: Visit the recruiter to find Customer Service employee candidates
tutorial_quest_recruiting_objective_3: Once you receive your candidates, hire an employee
tutorial_quest_recruiting_objective_4: Assign your employee to the Point of Sales station
tutorial_quest_expanding_product_line_un: Excellent, this is what I'm talking about! Make them work for you! The more employees you assign to clean and run the register, the more you’ll be free to do other things. Like expanding your product line to earn even more money!
tutorial_quest_expanding_product_line_ob:
Purchase furniture required to sell your new product. Recommended items:
{list}

Purchase new inventory to sell. Recommended items:
{list}
Place new furniture and inventory in your store
tutorial_quest_pretty_interior_uncle_fre: You should see the customers flooding in now! But with more customers, you’ll start to hear more complaining. They’re always complaining about something. Even still, you should make the place look nicer for them. Remember, happier customers spend more money!
tutorial_quest_pretty_interior_objective: Increase Interior Score to at least 20%
Purchase a Storage Shelf, Bathroom Stall and Modular Sink
Place the items in your store
Add a box of each of your top two products to the Storage Shelf
tutorial_quest_employee_upgrades_uncle_f: Great, things are looking better already! But there’s always more we can upgrade. Say, let’s improve your employees as well. I mean, after all they leave a lasting impression on your customers. So let’s make sure it’s a good one!
tutorial_quest_employee_upgrades_objecti: Train your employee’s primary skill to at least 50%
Reassign your employee to your business
Purchase Uniform Locker and place in your business
tutorial_quest_deliveries_uncle_fred: Hey kid are you getting tired of resupplying your inventory yourself? That's a dumb question, I know you are. And that’s what wholesale deliveries are for! Head on down to the nearest wholesaler and talk to the manager so you can set up automatic deliveries!
tutorial_quest_deliveries_objective_1: Set up a delivery contract with your local wholesaler
tutorial_quest_deliveries_objective_2: Set up a weekly delivery of at least 100 of each item you sell
tutorial_quest_marketing_uncle_fred: Okay, there’s one last thing we need to talk about: Marketing. Now, you might have a great store, but if people don’t know about it, they won’t show up! Let’s get you set up with a small marketing plan, okay?
tutorial_quest_marketing_objective_1: Create a marketing campaign for your business
tutorial_checkpoint_second_uncle_fred: Alright, look at you go! Your store is nearly running itself now! Now you just take care of customer complaints and adjust your weekly delivery amounts as needed. Also, give it a week and see how much that marketing boost is helping. Some stores need more, some might not even need marketing! You be the judge of that! Call me when things calm down and you’re ready to grow!
tutorial_checkpoint_second_objective: Call Uncle Fred when you’re ready to expand to a second business
tutorial_quest_multiple_stores_uncle_fre: I just know that snake, Richard, is cheating at golf! There’s no way I lost that badly!! But hey, enough about me! I hear you’re ready to expand your empire and become a serial entrepreneur. That certainly brightens my day, kid! But first, you're going to need to take some more business classes.
tutorial_quest_multiple_stores_objective: Complete the 'Market Demands' course at the Manhattan Business School
tutorial_quest_another_business_uncle_fr: Those business classes must be working - you sound like a real pro! Now let’s get your new store set up in a building with lots of foot traffic to get the most customers! And make sure you’re starting a business that sells products people actually want! Use the MarketInsider app to find out what’s hot right now!
tutorial_quest_another_business_objectiv: Open the MarketInsider App and sort the products by 'Demand'
Rent a retail building with at least 40% traffic
Open a wholesale retail business whose primary product is at least 80% demand
tutorial_quest_setup_store_uncle_fred: Kid, with that building and business, you can’t fail! You know, I think you’re starting to get the hang of things. So, let’s see how well you can set up this second store on your own. You know what to do - it’s just like your first one, but of course, with the proper items for this new store! Go get 'em, Tiger, I'm here if you need me.
tutorial_quest_setup_store_objective_1: Purchase and place the furniture required to start your new store
tutorial_quest_setup_store_objective_2: Recruit employees and assign them to work at your new store
tutorial_quest_setup_store_objective_3: Setup a new wholesale delivery with at least 1 product
tutorial_quest_setup_store_objective_4: Improve your new store's Interior Score to at least 20%
tutorial_quest_ensure_profit_uncle_fred: You're knocking it out of the park, kid! You keep this up, and I’ll have to start charging for my advice! I bet you’ve noticed that each new store is getting easier to set up! But you still have to make sure both businesses are profitable!
tutorial_quest_ensure_profit_objective_1: Ensure you have two profitable retail businesses in the Econoview App
tutorial_quest_money_cant_buy_happiness_: So, how many of your friends are running two businesses? Probably not many. But don’t forget to take care of yourself. You know, life isn’t only about making money! Sometimes you need to relax and play a little
Buy a desk, chair and computer from Ika Bohag
Place the desk in your apartment, and attach the chair and computer
Play video games for at least 1 hour
tutorial_quest_building_wealth_uncle_fre: It's an old saying, kid: money might not buy happiness, but it buys everything else! Let’s make sure your finances are settled. Pay off that loan and start saving up some money! The next thing I want to show you is a bit expensive!
tutorial_quest_using_blueprints_uncle_fr: Alright, kid, you’re doing fantastic. Now remember how I told you that each new business is easier to set up? Now I'm gonna show you a cool trick for this next one! Start up your next business, but then head over to the retail installation firm. Trust me
tutorial_quest_using_blueprints_objectiv: Open MarketInsider and find a wholesale product above 80% demand
Start a new wholesale retail business that sells that demanded item
Visit the retail interior installation firm and hire them to set up your new store
Wait for blueprint installation to complete
tutorial_quest_profit_all_three_uncle_fr: Huh, so what did I tell you? Simple, right? Expensive, but simple! Now open that new store and start earning back your money! And remember - it’s great to expand, kid, but don’t rush things and start losing money!
tutorial_quest_profit_all_three_objectiv: Ensure you have three profitable retail businesses
tutorial_checkpoint_third_uncle_fred: I'm gonna be honest kid, I wasn’t sure how far you’d make it. But it looks like you’ve mastered the wholesale arena. Color me impressed. Give me a call when you’re ready to import products at a higher level and automate things with a headquarters!
tutorial_checkpoint_third_objective: Call Uncle Fred when you’re ready to expand to imports and a headquarters
tutorial_quest_first_hq_uncle_fred: Excellent timing, kiddo. Your old Uncle Fred just pour himself a drink was wondering when you’d be back for more! So let’s build your empire a headquarters to operate from, okay? Step one, of course...more business school!
tutorial_quest_first_hq_objective_1: Complete the 'Headquarters' course at the Manhattan Business School
tutorial_quest_purchasing_agent_uncle_fr: Okay, I think it's time to kick things up a notch and start importing your inventory. You’ll need a Purchasing Agent to order and import a large variety of items at cheap prices! Hire and assign them to your headquarters!
tutorial_quest_purchasing_agent_objectiv: Recruit a Purchasing Agent from City Workforce Inc.
Buy a desk, computer and chair from Mr. Scott’s Office Supply Store
Place desk in headquarters and attach the computer and chair to create a workstation
Hire the Purchasing Agent and assign them to the workstation in the headquarters schedule
tutorial_quest_rent_warehouse_uncle_fred: Okay, perfect! But you can’t order anything until you have a place to store it all! Now let’s get you set up with a nice warehouse and some large pallet shelves! I love the smell of fresh inventory in the morning. Smells like profit.
tutorial_quest_rent_warehouse_objective_: Purchase at least one pallet shelf
tutorial_quest_first_import_contract_unc: Let’s get that Purchasing Agent an import contract so they can order your first batch of goods! Each importer sells different items and you’ll need a different Purchasing Agent for each importer. I’ll show you how to set up your first contract!
tutorial_quest_first_import_contract_obj: Set up an import contract with your Purchasing Agent
Place an import order using your Purchasing Agent
Verify the items have arrived in your warehouse
tutorial_quest_warehouse_driver_uncle_fr: We’re half-way there. You got the inventory to your warehouse, but we’ll need a delivery driver to get your new goods to your stores! You’re doing great, kid
tutorial_quest_warehouse_driver_objectiv: Drive your new van to warehouse and assign it to the vehicle slot
Recruit and hire a Delivery Driver from Andersons Recruitment
Assign your Driver to the warehouse vehicle slot with your van
tutorial_quest_logistics_network_uncle_f: Look at you, getting all fancy! There’s just one last step to set up your own logistics network! Now you need a Logistics Manager to tell the Delivery Drivers how much inventory to send to each store!
tutorial_quest_logistics_network_objecti: Recruit and hire a Logistics Manager
Create another workstation in your headquarters
Assign your Logistics Manager to the workstation in the headquarters schedule
Create a Logistics Plan in the Headquarters BizMan page for your warehouse to deliver to at least one destination
tutorial_checkpoint_fourth_uncle_fred: Amazing! With your new headquarters, you now have access to more inventory at cheaper prices! Now go ahead and assign all your stores to receive imports and make sure your delivery targets are set up properly! Call me when you’re done and ready to expand further!
tutorial_checkpoint_fourth_objective: Call Uncle Fred when you’re ready to continue expanding your headquarters
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_uncle_fred: Well hopefully your headquarters is running smoothly and making things easier on you already. Now let’s expand its usefulness! Hire an HR Manager to automatically train employees and provide them with a health care plan!
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_objective_1: Recruit and hire an HR Manager
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_objective_2: Create another workstation in your headquarters and assign your HR Manager
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_objective_3: Create an HR Plan in the Headquarters BizMan page and assign at least one employee
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_objective_4: Visit the Health Insurance Manager at the Hospital to set up a Health Care plan
tutorial_quest_hr_manager_objective_5: Wait for them to call you back, and accept a health plan
tutorial_quest_pricing_analyst_uncle_fre: Alright, let’s keep making things easier! You have a lot of businesses now and it can be a real pain to change the prices at each location! So go hire someone to help you manage your pricing! You'll thank me later!
tutorial_quest_pricing_analyst_objective: Recruit and hire a Pricing Analyst
Create another workstation in your headquarters and assign your Pricing Analyst
View Pricing Analyst Page to manage neighborhood pricing
tutorial_quest_headhunter_uncle_fred: Oh, and I’ll show you one more thing to really boost your headquarter’s value...headhunters! These folks can help recruit large numbers of employees. Which is really useful for staffing up a large office! Plus they can automatically replace employees that quit.
tutorial_quest_headhunter_objective_2: Create another workstation in your headquarters and assign your Headhunter
tutorial_quest_headhunter_objective_3: Create a Headhunter Plan in the Headquarters BizMan page to set up automatic employee replacement
tutorial_quest_office_business_uncle_fre: You know - those office buildings don’t have to be used for a headquarters. You can turn them into businesses and start earning more money with them instead! They don’t even require inventory! They’re basically just free money once you get them up and running! Set up a small office and see for yourself!
tutorial_quest_office_business_objective: Complete the 'Office Businesses' course at the Manhattan Business School
Rent an office building and start an office-based business
Recruit and hire the correct employees
Create workstations and assign your employees
tutorial_quest_buyout_business_uncle_fre: I'm telling you, you keep this up and no one will be able to stop you! Okay, kid, I’ve got one more trick to show you. It’s the easiest way to start a business: just buy one that already exists. Boom, done. New business, ready to go!
tutorial_quest_buyout_business_objective: Set up deliveries to the new location
tutorial_quest_investments_uncle_fred: Wow, look how much you’ve grown since you started out! That's really impressive. And I bet you’re now making enough money that the bank is charging you negative interest each week! Well let’s start investing your earnings, so the bank pays YOU instead!
tutorial_quest_investments_objective_1: Call or visit one of the banks and open an investment fund
tutorial_quest_casino_uncle_fred: Ah, much better. Your money is now safe from the bank’s negative interest. And that calls for a celebration! Why don't you head out to the Casino and see if you can make a quick buck...or lose a few. As long as your businesses are healthy, it’s all fun and games, right?
tutorial_quest_casino_objective_1: Buy a ticket for the casino boat on Friday between 18:00 (6PM) and 22:00 (10PM)
tutorial_quest_million_dollar_investment: Hey, welcome back, kid! Did you win any money? Ah, who cares when you’re having fun! But now, there is a good reason to save up money. I’ve got one more lesson to teach you, and it’s the most expensive!
Invest at least $1,000,000 into investment funds
tutorial_checkpoint_fifth_uncle_fred: I am so proud of you, kid. You’re officially a millionaire! Welcome to the club. You’re becoming a major player in this town! Now, you might have noticed that your top rivals are selling some items that you still can’t find at the importer. Well you call me when you’re ready to start manufacturing your own goods in your very own factory!
tutorial_checkpoint_fifth_objective: Call Uncle Fred when you’re ready to expand to factories
tutorial_quest_factory_uncle_fred: Woah, you’re getting so successful, I almost didn’t recognize you! And now you’re ready to compete with the city’s top rivals? Alright, let’s go then! If you want to take them down, you need a factory. This last step is ambitious, but you wouldn’t be here if you didn’t have big ambitions, right?
tutorial_quest_factory_objective_1: Complete the 'Product Manufacturing' course at the Manhattan Business School
tutorial_quest_factory_objective_2: Rent a warehouse and start a factory business
tutorial_quest_production_line_uncle_fre: Good, let’s not waste any time then. Let’s build that factory. Now these parts are expensive, and you need a lot of them, so plan out what you need and start to build up each piece when you can afford them!
tutorial_quest_production_line_objective: Purchase Input Station and Output Station
Place Input Station and Output Station in your factory
Build 1 Production Line (Check out the help files: Recipes)
tutorial_quest_manufacturing_products_un: It looks like your factory is ready to start running. You’ll need to get some raw goods, so get those imported from the correct import piers, and you’ll be manufacturing your own inventory in no time!
tutorial_quest_manufacturing_products_ob: Set up Raw Goods Import Contract and place an order
tutorial_quest_setting_sail_uncle_fred: Well, shoot. There you have it. You are now on your way to becoming the best in this town. What’s next, kid? Taking over the world? Well, before we get there, don’t forget to stop and enjoy what you have. Go buy a boat and sail around.
tutorial_quest_good_life_uncle_fred: You can’t get much fancier than owning a boat. Look at you, living the high-life! Congratulations kid. Now let’s really show off your wealth! Sail over to the luxury homes and buy yourself something fancy. With any luck, maybe we’ll be neighbors!
tutorial_quest_good_life_objective_1: Sail to the Hamptons and buy your first home
tutorial_quest_airport_dlc_uncle_fred: haha! Playing golf was your last lesson, kid! I’ve got nothing left to teach you - my work here is done. But it looks to me like you’re already ready to own this town. I guess the only thing left to do now is to find a new city to take over!
tutorial_quest_coming_soon_objective_1: Congrats, kid, you did it! Stay tuned for future updates!
tutorial_sidequest_active_rivalry_object: Open the Rivals app and check out the active rivalry
tutorial_sidequest_active_rivalry_uncle_: Remember when I said you were too small to be considered a threat? Well, now that you’ve opened more stores in their neighborhood, they’re starting to consider you a rival. Nice. You must be doing something right!
tutorial_sidequest_bankruptcy_objective_: Go to Vantander Bank and get a loan so you have a positive balance again
tutorial_sidequest_bankruptcy_uncle_fred: Look, kid, I'll be honest. It can be hard to get started, I get it. Now I’ll help you out, but this is just a one-time thing, and only because you're family. But don’t you dare tell anyone I did this because I have a tough reputation to uphold! Now you head over to Vantander Bank and we’ll get you an emergency loan to get back on your feet. Okay?
Okay, that should get you back on your feet! Now from here on out, be more careful. And try to keep your income positive. And remember - this is just between us!
tutorial_sidequest_first_rival_message_o: Open the Rivals app and check out your rival's businesses
tutorial_sidequest_first_rival_message_u: Look at this - a fellow business owner messaged you. Now don’t worry about this too much right now, you’re too small for them to care about. But you keep growing, and you might find yourself locked in a bitter rivalry!
tutorial_sidequest_first_rival_attack_ob: Open the Rivals app and check out the rival attack
tutorial_sidequest_first_rival_attack_un: Well, looks like you’ve got yourself a good, old-fashion feud going on! Just make sure to monitor your rival’s attacks since they can impact customer demand and acceptable pricing in your stores. Now, you can fight back or just try to wait it out! I know what I'd do.
tutorial_sidequest_turn_back_time_object: Visit Mr. Ternity at the hospital and purchase the Extended Warranty
tutorial_sidequest_turn_back_time_uncle_: Yeah, age really starts to creep up on you, huh? Doesn’t really seem fair, does it? I mean, with all this money, you’d think we’d be able to live forever, right? Well, I'm gonna let you in on a little secret, but you have to keep it between us rich folks, okay? We can. We can live forever. Oh, you don’t believe me? Okay, go to the hospital and ask for Mr. Ternity.
Feeling younger already, right? Make sure you come visit him every decade or so for another recharge! But, make sure to save up. Immortality isn’t cheap!
tutorial_no_business_suitable_for_this_q: There is no business suitable for this quest
interior_designer_security_coverage_not_: Security Coverage (not required in this business type)
dialog_interior_installation_firm_on_can: Alright, we'll stop the installation contract right away.
myemployees_mass_action_assign_business_: Hire and assign candidates to selected business
interior_designer_cannot_use_wall_tool_i: You cannot use the wall tool in a warehouse or factory
interior_designer_producer_not_a_produce: This item cannot be assigned products
interior_designer_queue_item_has_no_queu: This item does not have a customer queue
main_menu_custom_game_base_customer_prom: Impacts base level of customers without traffic or marketing
help_itemname_wallmountedtvstand_content:
**Wall Mounted TV Stand** is a decorative item that can be placed in a home or business.

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Ika Bohag](address:50 4s)
business_description_wholesalestore_6: Summoning the strength of titans to bring your business wholesale goods
business_description_wholesalestore_5: Providing superior wholesale service. We have the stock for your company.
